infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to take photos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to choose photos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app needs access to save photos to your library.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: This app needs access to write step data to the Health app.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your friends.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app accesses your camera to take pictures.
